question: 四十二階
sourceAnswer: Forty Second Floor, Floor Forty Two, Forty Second Story
activeAnswer: Forty Second Floor, Floor Forty Two, Forty Second Story
sourceMnemonic: You know that <ja>四十二</ja> means "forty two." So, as long as you know <kanji>floor</kanji> you'll know this means <vocabulary>forty-second floor</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
